comment.body:
It is blockied by Easylist China, not sure why.
But you can add an exclusion rule to the user rules list:
`ipv6.baidu.com,www.baidu.com,www1.baidu.com,xueshu.baidu.com#@##con-ar > .result-op[mu*="nourl.ubs.baidu.com"]`

issue.body:

There is a complication here. Block does not work regardless of whether the custom rule (user filter) is on or off. It does not work on all sites with any user rule. I also have Adguard Home on my router. The only way to solve it at the moment is to run Adguard Blocker (not Adguard Assistant) at the same time.
